@ ALL Moderators. Please the uploader a green-skull OR at least give him the chance to prove that he is not one of the spammers or DOSA or whtatever has been going on for the last week.

@ FANS of 20-40 - Please contact moderator and ask them to give green skull (VIP STATUS) to 20-40. 
Only do this if YOU believe he deserves to be a VIP member of TPB and so won't get blocked , with hundreds of others, as happened on week of 26th April. At least 3 times for upto 48+ hours.

I have contacted them through the [Conact Us] area and then [Fan Mail]. If anyone knows a better way please post every few posts so it isn't missed.

I am a massive fan and I think it is a disgtrace that he couldn't upload BUT that is ONLY my opinion.

For the invention of the [quark format] alone they should be handing out live time membership and awards.

Cheers
Jon
